<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define SHADER&#95;FEATURE&#95;FLAG(FeatureBit, DxilModuleBit, FlagName, Str)          \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  FlagName |= CSF.FlagName;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;llvm/BinaryFormat/DXContainerConstants.def&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
